CustomField.description: Select the target object field (e.g., Status or CustomField__c) whose values will be summarized and rolled up to the master object in this job.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the API name of the target object field (e.g., Status or CustomField__c) whose values will be summarized and rolled up to the master object in this job. An incorrect or missing API name will prevent the job from executing.
CustomField.label: Field to Aggregate
